TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataGridPageChangedEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

summary.span: 为 控件的 事件提供数据。

span.span: Provides data for the event of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中的页上选择元素的按钮时引发事件控件被单击。The event is raised when a button in the page selection element of the control is clicked. 有关的实例的初始属性值的列表，请参阅构造函数。For a list of initial property values for an instance of , see the constructor. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何指定和代码的处理程序事件。The following code example demonstrates how to specify and code a handler for the event. 它在显示页以 10 项的增量的控件。It displays pages on the control in 10-item increments. [!code-aspx-csharp[DataGridAllowPaging#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataGridAllowPaging/CS/datagridallowpagingcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DataGridAllowPaging#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataGridAllowPaging/VB/datagridallowpagingvb.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-csharp[PageIndexChanged#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/PageIndexChanged/CS/datagridpageindexchangedcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[PageIndexChanged#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/PageIndexChanged/VB/datagridpageindexchangedvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数来创建和初始化的新实例类。Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the class. 实例时创建此构造函数的调用中，通过以下属性将初始化为指定的值。When an instance of is created by a call to this constructor, the following properties are initialized to the specified values. |属性Properties|初始值Initial value| |----------------|-------------------| ||`commandSource` 参数。The `commandSource` parameter.| ||`newPageIndex` 参数。The `newPageIndex` parameter.| ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建和初始化的新实例类。The following code example demonstrates how to create and initialize a new instance of the class. MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property CommandSource As Object
public: property System::Object ^ CommandSource { System::Object ^ get(); };

span.span: Gets the source of the command.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性以确定引发事件的命令的源。Use the property to determine the source of the command that raised the event. 因为中的页上选择元素的按钮时仅将引发此事件单击控件，返回的源是表示页面选择元素的对象。Because this event is raised only when a button in the page selection element of the control is clicked, the returned source is a object that represents the page selection element. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性以编程方式控制引发事件的命令源。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to programmatically control the command source that raises the event. [!code-aspx-csharp[DataGridAllowPaging#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataGridAllowPaging/CS/datagridallowpagingcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DataGridAllowPaging#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataGridAllowPaging/VB/datagridallowpagingvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property NewPageIndex As Integer
public: property int NewPageIndex { int get(); };

summary.span: 获取用户在 控件的页选择元素中选定的页的索引。

span.span: Gets the index of the page selected by the user in the page selection element of the control.

value.span: 用户在 控件的页选择元素中选定的页的索引。

span.span: The index of the page selected by the user in the page selection element of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来确定用户在页选择元素选择的页的索引控件。Use the property to determine the index of the page selected by the user in the page selection element of the control. 此值通常用于设置属性控件来显示所选的页面。This value is often used to set the property of the control to display the selected page. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来确定用户在页选择元素选择的页的索引控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to determine the index of the page selected by the user in the page selection element of the control. 然后使用此值设置属性控件来显示所选的页面。This value is then used to set the property of the control to display the selected page. [!code-aspx-csharp[DataGridAllowPaging#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataGridAllowPaging/CS/datagridallowpagingcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DataGridAllowPaging#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataGridAllowPaging/VB/datagridallowpagingvb.aspx#1)]
